comment.author: 76204898@N00
comment._content: A remarkable amount of pre-digital photoshopping going on in the picture...

comment.author: 92284803@N00
comment._content: They seem fond of drawing in the hilights and shadows, I guess the 1910s version of sharpening. I wonder, did they then re-photograph the image?

comment.author: 35999063@N00
comment._content: It is really odd-the people almost look like cartoons-especially the guy in the right foreground

comment.author: 15283643@N04
comment._content: The retouching probably wasn't noticeable when the photos were printed in newspapers.

comment._content: Muito legal, pois em alguns pontos as pessoas são desenhos e em outros ali  no meio estão misturados ao real!
